Description: Functional TesterCollaborate with cross-functional teams to understand software requirements, design specifications, and acceptance criteria.Develop and execute comprehensive test plans, test cases, and test scripts to validate the functionality and usability of software applications.Perform functional testing to verify that the software meets the defined requirements and functions as intended.Identify and document software defects and issues, and track them through to resolution using defect tracking tools.Conduct regression testing to ensure that previously identified defects have been addressed and do not reoccur.Collaborate with developers to reproduce and troubleshoot issues, and provide detailed reports on defects and test results.Participate in test case reviews and provide feedback to improve test coverage and effectiveness.  Skills
Skills:
Good Experience in Functional Arabic testing
Good knowledge and experience in testing life cycle, test phases such as integration, system, functional and regression testing
Experience in creating Test scenarios, test cases and test data.
Experience in Test Execution and reporting test results and defects
Exposure to agile/scrum methodologies.
Good Knowledge in defect life cycle
Good communication skills
Note : Salary: 10,000 SAR - in hand per month: Hosing + Transport taking care by Self.
